content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Steps 16-23)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position -9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler (position -5.0, 2.5) - now fueled with coal
- Steam engine (position 0.5, 6.5)
- Connected pipe network (positions -8.5,-0.5 to -5.5,0.5)
- Small electric pole (position 0.5, 3.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Operation at position (19.5, 74.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position 19.5, 74.5)
- Wooden chest for ore collection (position 19.5, 76.5)
- Two stone furnaces (positions 20.0, 78.0 and 23.0, 78.0)
- Inserters (positions 21.5, 78.5 and 24.5, 78.5)
- Output wooden chest (position 25.5, 78.5)
- Connected with power poles (positions 10.5,45.5 to 31.5,46.5)

### New Temporary Furnace at position (-1.0, 13.0)
- Stone furnace (position -1.0, 13.0)
- Currently idle due to lack of ingredients

## ERROR TIPS

### Persistent resource location errors
- Verify iron ore patches exist before attempting to mine (steps 16-17)
- Expand search radius when scanning for resources
- Consider exploring new map areas if no resources found locally

### Power system issues
- Fixed boiler fuel issue (step 18)
- Monitor power pole connections when expanding operations
- Verify steam engine fluid connections remain intact

### Placement distance errors
- Move within 10 tiles before placing entities (steps 22-23)
- Plan operations in local clusters rather than distant placements
- Use temporary markers to plan distant constructions

### Entity placement collisions
- Check for existing entities before placing (steps 20,23)
- Increase spacing between entities when placement fails
- Clear area completely before new constructions

### API usage errors
- Correct inventory inspection syntax (step 19)
- Verify object attributes before accessing (steps 21,22)
- Use proper entity references in placement functions

### Furnace operation issues
- Ensure furnaces have both fuel and ingredients
- Verify inserter connections to furnaces
- Monitor output chest capacity

## NAMESPACE

### Important Variables
- iron_patch: Position | None - Stores location of iron ore resources
- drill: Entity - Reference to mining drill entity
- furnace: Entity - Reference to smelting furnace entity
- output_chest: Entity - Reference to output storage chest
- belt: Entity - Reference to transport belt entity
- power_pole: Position - Reference to power infrastructure location
